dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4574 IH: District of Columbia Courts Home Rule Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to permit the Council of the District of Columbia to enact laws with respect to the organization and jurisdiction of the District of Columbia courts.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the District of Columbia Courts Home Rule Act.

section.header: Authority of Council of District of Columbia to enact laws with respect to District of Columbia Courts
section.text: Section 602(a) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act (sec. 1â€“206.02(a), D.C. Official Code) is amended by striking paragraph (4).
